column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We ordered a large deep dish "Lou" pizza for three people as two of us were vegetarians. First glances
column2: pretty good! It looked like a good Deep Dish pizza. Taste wise
column3: it was average. I would have liked to have more toppings. My friend observed that the amount of mushrooms and spinach was reduced. We aren't sure if that's a one-off thing.
